gist.headline: Slide into the hive
gist.blurb: Turn your messy notes into polished presentations with LandPPT, now available in our Creative showcase.
gist.summary: LandPPT has been added to the Creative apps list, offering LLM-powered document-to-presentation conversion.
gist.impact: Users can now discover and access LandPPT directly from the Pollinations app directory to automate slide creation.
gist.visual_concept: The bee mascot as a presenter with a slide deck. Represents the new LandPPT app for creating presentations.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot wearing smart glasses and holding a tiny pointer stick, standing next to a retro projector screen showing colorful pixelated slides and charts. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi office vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'LANDPPT'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
